attributes.action: rid us of pointless airport security measures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the government properly examine the security measures forced on us at airports and admit that they are a huge waste of time and money and have done nothing to increase our safety. 

Specifically I would like an acknowledgement that there are no liquid explosives that are dangerous in 150ml quantities yet safe in 100ml quantities and contained in a resalable bag. As anyone who flies knows this is the most pointless of a long list of idiotic and time wasting measures.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
